mapper.select: SELECT ID, PID, PERM_NAME, ICON, SORT, PERM_CODE, ROUTER_PATH, COMPONENT_NAME, COMPONENT_PATH, PERM_TYPE, PERM_LEVEL, ENABLED, I_FRAME, CACHE, HIDDEN, CREATE_USER, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_USER, UPDATE_TIME FROM permission WHERE DELETED = 0 AND ID = #{permId}
SELECT * FROM permission WHERE DELETED = 0 AND PERM_TYPE != 3 ORDER BY SORT, PERM_NAME
SELECT r.NAME, r.CODE value, r.DEFAULT_LEVEL permLevel, (SELECT IF(COUNT(1) > 0, true, false) FROM permission WHERE PERM_CODE = r.CODE) DISABLED FROM router r ORDER BY r.NAME
SELECT * FROM permission WHERE PERM_NAME = #{permName} AND DELETED = 0
SELECT * FROM permission WHERE COMPONENT_NAME = #{componentName} AND DELETED = 0
